column1: Healthy oils are very good for acne prone skin. Using an oil cleanser and oil serums solved my acne problems. Look it up and read about it- its also all over youtube.
Loving these techniques keep 'em comin! Any chance we could find out what the lavender eye makeup Nichola is wearing? Is it an eyeliner or an eye shadow?
Use Fractionated coconut oil with tea tree essential oil or watermelon seed essential oil. It will help heal your acne and acne scars.
What to use instead of facial oil if you have oily/acne-prone skin?
Yes, I have the same question that "spider girl" asked. What about some of us that have sensitive/oily skin. We don't want to add more oil.....do we?
